channel.title: Help with my Altar i need some coders assistance!
channel.description: well i put an altar down but when i click on it it work recharge my prayer points which is a bummer seen as thats kinda mean to happen, so i was wondering if anyone would be so kind as to tell me how i make my altar recharge prayer points on my server. could you put the code in a post or link me to were there is a tut on how to make altars work ty.
